Ders Dağıtım Programı
  • Reports Modülü
  • Sayfa kaynağını görüntüle

Reports Modülü

Bu modül, rapor üretimini sağlar.

Excel Generator

Excel generator for the Class Scheduling Program.

class reports.excel_generator.ExcelGenerator(db_manager=None)[kaynak]

Bases: object

Handles Excel report generation with styled tables.

__init__(db_manager=None)[kaynak]
generate_excel(title, headers, data, filename='report.xlsx')[kaynak]

Generates an Excel file with a styled table from structured data.

PDF Generator

PDF generator for the Class Scheduling Program using ReportLab Platypus.

class reports.pdf_generator.PDFGenerator(db_manager=None)[kaynak]

Bases: object

Handles PDF report generation with styled tables.

__init__(db_manager=None)[kaynak]
generate_pdf(title, headers, data, filename='report.pdf')[kaynak]

Generates a PDF with a styled table from structured data.

HTML Generator

HTML Report Generator for Class Scheduling Program Creates beautiful, colorful web-based schedule tables

class reports.html_generator.HTMLScheduleGenerator(db_manager)[kaynak]

Bases: object

Generate beautiful HTML schedule reports

__init__(db_manager)[kaynak]
generate_class_schedule_html(class_id: int) → str[kaynak]

Generate HTML schedule for a specific class

save_html_report(class_id: int, filename: str = None) → str[kaynak]

Save HTML report to file

open_in_browser(class_id: int)[kaynak]

Open HTML report in default browser

Kullanım Örnekleri

Excel Raporu Oluşturma

from reports.excel_generator import ExcelGenerator
from database.db_manager import DatabaseManager

db = DatabaseManager("schedule.db")
generator = ExcelGenerator(db)

# Sınıf programı
generator.generate_class_schedule(class_id=1, output_file="9A_program.xlsx")

# Öğretmen programı
generator.generate_teacher_schedule(teacher_id=1, output_file="teacher_program.xlsx")

PDF Raporu Oluşturma

from reports.pdf_generator import PDFGenerator

generator = PDFGenerator(db)

# PDF oluştur
generator.generate_class_schedule(class_id=1, output_file="9A_program.pdf")
